job.title: Data Scientist
job.industry: Marketing and Advertising,Information Technology and Services,Computer Software
job.description: Nice to meet you.  Simply put, we’re a growth firm. Leading companies hire us to help their organizations reach their full potential by putting people first and creating change that matters. How, you ask? We help our clients find and engage new markets & customers, pioneer new ventures, and create new products, services and business models that will transform their organizations. We love passionately curious people who think of themselves as lifelong learners. They are humble, engaging and intelligent. They have strong opinions with open minds. They are proactive and entrepreneurial.  Critical thinking is their sharpest tool, and they fearlessly tackle tough problems. They understand that understanding is a key part of building trust and driving positive outcomes. That’s why they lead with empathy—motivating internally and externally, and having the hard conversations when needed.  They believe that teams do it best, and the best outcomes come from hearing perspectives that aren’t their own. At Three Five Two, we push for everyone to find and use their voice, and respecting each others’ is non-negotiable. We are looking for a Data Scientist to help our clients and internal teams interpret and act on their data. You will work alongside diverse teams of passionate strategists, researchers, developers, designers, and marketers to create comprehensive business strategies and digital solutions. Your clients could include SaaS products, startups, Fortune 100 companies, and more.  We are looking for someone with a solid blend of technical aptitude, strategic thinking, and great communication skills. What You'll Get We welcome people from all backgrounds who seek the opportunity to help build a future where everyone and everything can move independently. If you have curiosity, passion, and collaborative spirit, work with us, and let’s move the world forward, together.  Three Five Two is an Equal Opportunity Employer and Prohibits Discrimination and Harassment of Any Kind Three Five Two is committed to the principle of equal employment opportunity for all employees and to providing employees with a work environment free of discrimination and harassment. All employment decisions at Three Five Two are based on business needs, job requirements and individual qualifications, without regard to race, color, religion or belief, national, social or ethnic origin, sex (including pregnancy), age, physical, mental or sensory disability, HIV Status, sexual orientation, gender identity and/or expression, marital, civil union or domestic partnership status, past or present military service, family medical history or genetic information, family or parental status, or any other status protected by the laws or regulations in the locations where we operate. Three Five Two will not tolerate discrimination or harassment based on any of these characteristics. Three Five Two encourages applicants of all ages. Three Five Two will provide reasonable accommodation to employees who have protected disabilities consistent with local law.
